languages.text: "Нет, Лорд-капитан. Его не было в списке разыскиваемых в Коронусе преступников. Полагаю, из-за относительной незначительности ересей, в которых он был обвинен локальными властями. Возможно, проктор Антар располагал сведениями, к которым у Имперского флота нет доступа".

traits.locale_text: "Его не было в списке разыскиваемых в Коронусе преступников".

languages.text: "No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."
languages.original_text: "Нет, Лорд-капитан. Его не было в списке разыскиваемых в Коронусе преступников. Полагаю, из-за относительной незначительности ересей, в которых он был обвинен локальными властями. Возможно, проктор Антар располагал сведениями, к которым у Имперского флота нет доступа".

traits.locale_text: "No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse. I assume because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the local authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

"No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse. I assume because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the local authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

"No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse. I assume because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the local authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

"No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

"No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

languages.text: 「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン。彼はコロヌス・エクスパンスの指名手配犯リストには載っていませんでした。おそらく、カリクシアの当局から告発されていた彼の異端行為が、さほど重大なものとは見なされなかったためだと思われます。あるいは、アンサール代理人が、帝国海軍では把握できない情報を持っていたのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン。彼はコロヌス・エクスパンスの指名手配犯リストには載っていませんでした。おそらく、地元当局から告発されていた彼の異端行為が、さほど重大なものとは見なされなかったためだと思われます。あるいは、アンサール代理人が、帝国海軍では把握できない情報を持っていたのかもしれません」

languages.text: "Hayır, Lord Kaptan. Kendisi Koronus Enginliği'nde aranan suçlular listesinde yoktu. Bunun nedeni de Calixisli yetkililerin kendisine yöneltilen kâfirlik suçlarının görece önemsiz olması olsa gerek. Belki de Üsteğmen Anthar, İmparatorluk Donanması'nın erişemediği bazı bilgilere sahipti."
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, Lord Kaptan. Kendisi Koronus Enginliği'nde aranan suçlular listesinde yoktu. Bunun nedeni de Calixisli yetkililerin kendisine yöneltilen kâfirlik suçlarının görece önemsiz olması olsa gerek. Belki de Üsteğmen Anthar, İmparatorluk Donanması'nın erişemediği bazı bilgilere sahipti."

languages.text: «No, Lord Capitán. No estaba en la lista de criminales buscados de la Extensión de Koronus. Imagino que se debe a la relativa insignificancia de las herejías de las que le acusaban las autoridades de Calixis. Tal vez el Procurador Anthar tenga información de la que la Armada Imperial no dispone».
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

traits.locale_text: «No, Lord Capitán. No estaba en la lista de criminales buscados de la Extensión de Koronus. Imagino que se debe a la relativa insignificancia de las herejías de las que le acusaban las autoridades de Calixis. Tal vez el Procurador Anthar tenga información de la que la Armada Imperial no dispone».

languages.text: “并不清楚，舰长大人，那个人不在科罗努斯扩区的通缉犯名单上。我推测，这或许是因为卡利西斯当局指控的异端恶行，实际上相当微不足道。又或许，安萨监察官掌握了某些帝国海军并不了解的情报。”
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

traits.locale_text: “并不清楚，舰长大人，那个人不在科罗努斯扩区的通缉犯名单上。我推测，这或许是因为卡利西斯当局指控的异端恶行，实际上相当微不足道。又或许，安萨监察官掌握了某些帝国海军并不了解的情报。”

languages.text: « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il ne faisait pas partie de la liste des criminels recherchés dans les Étendues de Koronus. J'imagine que cela est dû à la gravité limitée des hérésies dont il était accusé par les autorités de Calixis. Peut-être que le proctor Anthar disposait d'informations que la Marine Impériale ne possédait pas. »
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

traits.locale_text: « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il ne faisait pas partie de la liste des criminels recherchés dans les Étendues de Koronus. J'imagine que cela est dû à la gravité limitée des hérésies dont il était accusé par les autorités de Calixis. Peut-être que le proctor Anthar disposait d'informations que la Marine Impériale ne possédait pas. »

languages.text: "Nein, Lord Captain. Er stand nicht auf der Liste der gesuchten Kriminellen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung ... ich nehme an, wegen der relativen Nichtigkeit der Häresien, die ihm die Behörden von Calixis zur Last legten. Möglicherweise lagen Proktor Anthar Informationen vor, zu denen die imperiale Kriegsflotte keinen Zugang hat."
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain. He was not on the list of wanted criminals in the Koronus Expanse — I assume it is because of the relative insignificance of the heresies he was accused of by the Calixian authorities. Perhaps Proctor Anthar had information to which the Imperial Navy does not have access."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Lord Captain. Er stand nicht auf der Liste der gesuchten Kriminellen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung ... ich nehme an, wegen der relativen Nichtigkeit der Häresien, die ihm die Behörden von Calixis zur Last legten. Möglicherweise lagen Proktor Anthar Informationen vor, zu denen die imperiale Kriegsflotte keinen Zugang hat."
